channel.title: Windows10 on CLOUD DATACENTER & DEVICE MANAGEMENT BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Windows10 on CLOUD DATACENTER & DEVICE MANAGEMENT BLOG

item.title: Announcing Windows 10
item.description: Earlier today Microsoft announced Windows 10, next version of the client Operating System. Following the announcement today, Technical Preview to be available on 1stOctober (US Date & Time), which will be available for us later tonight or early tomorrow. Microsoft is also introducing Windows Insider Program, which allows a user to download Windows 10 Technical Preview and also provide feedback to Microsoft. Official Announcement -> http://blogs.windows.com/bloggingwindows/2014/09/30/announcing-windows-10/ Windows Insider Program -> http://preview.
